Detailed Description

cvmx_dfa_ddr2_bus

DFA_DDR2_BUS = DFA DDR Bus Activity Counter

Description: This counter counts # cycles that the memory bus is doing a read/write/command Useful to benchmark the bus utilization as a ratio of #Cycles of Data Transfer/#Cycles since init or #Cycles of Data Transfer/#Cycles that memory controller is active
